00031 #pragma mark -
00032 #pragma mark Debugging Tools
00033 
00080 #define NILOGLEVEL_INFO     5
00081 #define NILOGLEVEL_WARNING  3
00082 #define NILOGLEVEL_ERROR    1
00083 
00091 extern NSInteger NIMaxLogLevel;
00092 
00099 #ifdef DEBUG
00100 #define NIDPRINT(xx, ...)  NSLog(@"%s(%d): " xx, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00101 #else
00102 #define NIDPRINT(xx, ...)  ((void)0)
00103 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00104 
00108 #define NIDPRINTMETHODNAME() NIDPRINT(@"%s", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)
00109 
00116 #ifdef DEBUG
00117 
00118 #import <TargetConditionals.h>
00119 
00120 #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR
00121 int NIIsInDebugger();
00122 // We leave the __asm__ in this macro so that when a break occurs, we don't have to step out of
00123 // a "breakInDebugger" function.
00124 #define NIDASSERT(xx) { if (!(xx)) { NIDPRINT(@"NIDASSERT failed: %s", #xx); \
00125 if (NIIsInDebugger()) { __asm__("int $3\n" : : ); }; } \
00126 } ((void)0)
00127 #else
00128 #define NIDASSERT(xx) { if (!(xx)) { NIDPRINT(@"NIDASSERT failed: %s", #xx); } } ((void)0)
00129 #endif // #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR
00130 
00131 #else
00132 #define NIDASSERT(xx) ((void)0)
00133 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00134 
00135 #ifdef DEBUG
00136 #define NIDCONDITIONLOG(condition, xx, ...) { if ((condition)) { NIDPRINT(xx, ##__VA_ARGS__); } \
00137 } ((void)0)
00138 #else
00139 #define NIDCONDITIONLOG(condition, xx, ...) ((void)0)
00140 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00141 
00142 
00143 #pragma mark Level-Based Loggers
00144 
00153 #define NIDERROR(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_ERROR <= NIMaxLogLevel), xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00154 
00158 #define NIDWARNING(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_WARNING <= NIMaxLogLevel), \
00159                                              xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00160 
00164 #define NIDINFO(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_INFO <= NIMaxLogLevel), xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00165 // End of Level-Based Loggers
00167 
00168 
00170 // End of Debugging-Tools //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
